hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
# Source folder containing the scripts source_scripts_folder="${JENKINS_HOME}/workspace/Bash_Functions/" ls -la "$source_scripts_folder"
# Iterate through the files in the folder and source them for script_file in "$source_scripts_folder"*.sh; do chmod +x "$script_file" if [ -f "$script_file" ] && [ -x "$script_file" ]; then echo "sourcing $script_file" source "$script_file" fi done
assume_role
# Getting a secret value by secret name dbuser_pass=$(fetch_secret "$database_root_user_secret_name")
# dbuser - seems to be the root user dbuser_username=$(extract_field "$dbuser_pass" "username") dbuser_password=$(extract_field "$dbuser_pass" "password") dbuser_host=$(extract_field "$dbuser_pass" "host")
initialize_shared_db_config "${dbuser_host%:3306}" "$dbuser_username" "$dbuser_password" drop_database_if_exists "auth" drop_database_if_exists "picsure" unset_shared_db_config
